questions.question_text: A company is forming a platform engineering team. Which organizational structure best supports platform adoption across multiple product teams?

options.text: Platform team reports to a single product team and prioritizes their needs
Platform team operates as a centralized service organization with clear SLAs and feedback mechanisms
Each product team builds and maintains their own platform tools independently
Platform team only handles infrastructure provisioning without developer tooling

questions.explanation: A centralized platform team that operates as a service organization with clear SLAs and feedback mechanisms ensures consistent platform capabilities across all product teams while maintaining accountability and continuous improvement.
